project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a simple contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts. The contacts will be stored in a JSON file, and user interaction will be conducted through the terminal.

task.name: Implement the functionality to add contacts
Implement the functionality to search for contacts
Implement the functionality to update existing contacts
Implement the functionality to delete contacts
Implement JSON file handling for storing contacts
Write tests for each of the functionalities above
Execute tests on all implemented functionalities to ensure that they function correctly
